description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items include- The Spessart, an area of unspoilt nature; the Defence Commissioner; Documenta '82, a forum of international art; Heligoland, an island in the North Sea; an effort to reduce traffic noise; country youth and a derby for three-year-old horses.
